meanings.sent1: My peeps and I went to the park to play.
meanings.sent2: I saw my peeps at the store yesterday.
meanings.sent3: My peeps always make me laugh with their jokes.
meanings.sent4: Even though we come from different backgrounds, we are all peeps in this community.
meanings.sent5: The peeps in my neighborhood are friendly and welcoming.

meanings.sent1: I quickly peepsed out the window to see who was knocking.
meanings.sent2: She peepsed around the corner to check if the coast was clear.
meanings.sent3: The cat peepsed at the mouse before pouncing on it.
meanings.sent4: He peepsed at the test paper of his neighbor during the exam.
meanings.sent5: The detective peepsed through the keyhole to gather information.

meanings.definition: The faint sound of a small bird or animal
meanings.sent1: In the quiet forest, we could hear the peeps of tiny birds.
meanings.sent2: The peeps of the baby chicks were adorable.
meanings.sent3: The peeps of the squirrel caught my attention in the park.
meanings.sent4: The peeps of the mouse alerted the cat to its presence.
meanings.sent5: The peeps of the cricket added to the nighttime symphony of sounds.
